title: Template Patches Configuration
description: Defines patches to apply to EDS template files during reset operations. Patch content (searchPattern, replacement) is stored in separate TypeScript files under patches/

patches.description: Array of patch metadata. Content is loaded from patches/{id}.ts

id.description: Unique identifier for the patch (lowercase, hyphens only). Must match filename in patches/ directory.

filePath.description: Relative path to the file in the template repo (e.g., 'blocks/header/header.js')

description.description: Human-readable description of what the patch fixes
